text: convinced, on the basis of the information it has so far, that such a project would be justified from a scientific point of view; and not merely constitute a "prestige satellite, duplicating to some extent American efforts, as Die Welt suggests today in a highly critical editorial article.
handwritten_text: convinced, on the basis of the information it has so far, that such a project would be justified from a scientific point of view; and not merely constitute a "prestige satellite, duplicating to some extent American efforts, as Die Welt suggests today in a highly critical editorial article.
